description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2a. Physical description: 19 lines per page; written in shikastah in black on machine-made paper. Rubrication in violet; catchwords. Incomplete at end: text breaks off in al-Qawl fī al-mafhūm wa-al-manṭūq. Origin: Second half of 19th century. Incipit: القول في الصحيح و الاعم قد اختلف انظار اهل النظر
author: Kalantarī, Abū al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad ʻAlī, 1820-1875
extent: 209 leaves : paper ; 215 x 153 (150 x 84) mm bound to 221 x 155 mm
title: Fī taḥrīrāt
creator: كلانتري، ابو القاسم بن محمد علي، 1820-1875
subject: Islamic law—Interpretation and construction
binding_note: Full red leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants, and fillets; blue flyleaves.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
